foodies.name: Burger King
foodies.description: Juicy, big, loaded with toppings of choice.
reviews: It's flavourful! Just the way I like it!!
Condiments!, Lots!
The cole-slow brings me back everytime,such a statement maker!

foodies.name: Perfect Combo
foodies.description: Double-Burger + large chips on OFFER!!Just for YOU!
reviews: Generous fresh Toppings, Loved IT
Large burgers ae the thing
The salad was the best part

foodies.name: Pork Ribs
reviews: Easy fall off of flesh and sooo juicy
You can never go wrong with pork

foodies.name: Crunchy oven-baked chicken
reviews: Very cripsy
Great size,and golden color

foodies.name: Pizza Sensation
foodies.description: Jumbo mega-pizza perfect for cheese lovers
reviews: Mouth-watering impression,soo good
Heavenly crust
Smell of warm cheese,fantastic!

foodies.name: Chicken-tikka Strips
foodies.description: Sticky barbecued wings and chest with a burst of flavours
reviews: Satisfying meal
Chicken like no other, best served hot

foodies.name: Beef Boerwors
foodies.description: Instant Grill and served with sauted onions,mayonesse and love!
reviews: Lots of salad and onions, loved IT!
Grilled to perfection
So tasty

foodies.name: Mac N Cheese
foodies.description: Pasta sensation with lots of cheese
reviews: It's a flavor that makes you wonder
Can/'t go a day without
Makes Lunch the best part of the day!

foodies.name: Power-Salad
foodies.description: Whole-grain lettuce dressed salad, garished in olive oil and heavenly mix of sauces
reviews: Great way to start the day!
Such a great healthy feeling I get everytime I eat this
Great combo in the salad,love the cereals ,fruits and chicken strips

foodies.name: Brunch-Spread
foodies.description: A deliciously generous spread of breakfast goodness. Greatness in a plate!
reviews: Love everything about it
A brunch-spread everyone neeeds to taste
So good and satisfying.Definitely ordering another tomorrow morning
